question: 叙勲
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Describe</kanji> someone's <kanji>merit</kanji> at a ceremony for the <vocabulary>conferring of decorations</vocabulary>. That's when medals are given out to people who deserve them. Usually in the military or something.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
